//Sarvagya Agarwal
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define rep(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<=b;++i)
#define is(X) cout<<#X<<" is "<<X<<endl
#define ff first
#define ll long long
#define ss second
#define fast ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);cout.tie(0)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define openin freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define openout freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
int cost[1005][1005],N[1005][1005],W[1005][1005],E[1005][1005],S[1005][1005];
int main()
{
    fast;
    //openin;
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int R,C;
        cin>>R>>C;
        rep(i,1,R)
        {
            rep(j,1,C)
                cin>>cost[i][j];
        }
        //fill north
        rep(i,1,C)N[1][i]=cost[1][i];
        rep(i,2,R)
        {
            rep(j,1,C)
            N[i][j] = cost[i][j] + min(0,N[i-1][j]);
        }
        //fill south
        rep(i,1,C)S[R][i]=cost[R][i];
        for(int i=R-1;i>=1;--i)
        {
            rep(j,1,C)
            S[i][j] = cost[i][j] + min(0,S[i+1][j]);
        }
        //fill east
        rep(i,1,R)E[i][C]=cost[i][C];
        for(int j = C-1;j>=1;--j)
        {
            rep(i,1,R)
            E[i][j] = cost[i][j] + min(0,E[i][j+1]);
        }
        //fill west
        rep(i,1,R)W[i][1]=cost[i][1];
        rep(j,2,C)
        {
            rep(i,1,R)
            W[i][j] = cost[i][j] + min(0,W[i][j-1]);
        }
        int ans = INT_MAX;
        rep(i,1,R)
        {
            rep(j,1,C)
            {
                ans = min(ans,N[i][j]+S[i][j]+E[i][j]+W[i][j]-3*cost[i][j]);
            }
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
